profileText: a Representative from Michigan; born in Portland, Ionia County, Mich., July 11, 1970; graduated from Portland High School, Portland, Mich., 1988; B.A., Michigan State University, East Lansing, Mich., 1992; M.P.A, University of Michigan Flint, Flint, Mich., 2010; nonprofit executive; professional advocate; staff, Michigan department of human services, 2004-2006; staff, Michigan department of education, 2006-2007; city commissioner, Bay City, Mich., 2019-2022; member of the Michigan state senate, 2023-2025, assistant majority floor leader, 2023-2025; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress (January 3, 2025-present).
